Episodes.Title: A Lesson for Your Next Life
Episodes.Writer: Simon Racioppa, Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: In the aftermath of his father's betrayal, Mark struggles with his responsibilities as Invincible and encounters an unexpected enemy.

Episodes.Title: In About Six Hours I Lose My Virginity to a Fish
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: It's summer break for Mark and his friends, but supervillains don't take a vacation. Mark is forced to face the consequences of Omni-Man's double life.

Episodes.Title: This Missive, This Machination!
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: Mark starts his college career, Debbie struggles with personal trauma, and Allen the Alien returns home to find a new threat facing the Coalition of Planets.

Episodes.Title: It's Been a While
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: Mark answers the call to save an alien species but it comes with unexpected, personal consequences.

Episodes.Title: This Must Come as a Shock
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: The Grayson household is upended when Mark returns to Earth with surprising new responsibilities. The Guardians of the Globe face dangers both at home and away.

Episodes.Title: It's Not That Simple
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: After two challenging missions, The Guardians of the Globe struggle to work as a team. Meanwhile, Mark tries to balance his hero duties, personal relationships, and his future as a college student.

Episodes.Title: I'm Not Going Anywhere
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: Mark's personal life is in turmoil as a formidable new villain emerges, posing Invincible's toughest challenge yet. Meanwhile, Donald confronts his troubled past.

Episodes.Title: I Thought You Were Stronger
Episodes.Writer: Robert Kirkman, Cory Walker, Ryan Ottley
Episodes.Actors: Steven Yeun, Sandra Oh, J.K. Simmons
Episodes.Plot: An old enemy threatens everything Mark holds dear.
